name: Tanks 2018
description:
Tanks 2018 is team-based couch co-op in a top-down 2D grid where the player plays as a tank to defeat the other team in varieties of game mode using the strategic base building and fast-paced ranged combat.

To get the best experience and to play local multiplayer, download the game and use Xbox controllers!

Press M to enable mouse controls!
If you are using Google Chrome and experiencing low frame-rate, make sure the "Use hardware acceleration" option in Advanced Settings is turned on.
